Name: Higgs Boson: Challenging Puzzle
About the game: Higgs Boson: Challenging Puzzle is a short and challenging experience where the player must rotate pieces considering the move limit to assemble a particle accelerator. Rotate the pieces to form a geometric shape and make the particles collide with each other; Featuring: 30+ levels; Relaxing soundtrack; Movement limit that makes the game challenging; Assemble shapes with limited movements Synchronized rotation
